title: Packers Coaching Candidates, Panthers Rumors with Brady Quinn (Football 12/04)
description:
Will Brinson is joined by Brady Quinn to break down the Monday night game between the Eagles and Redskins (1:00), who the Packers should hire in the wake of firing Mike McCarthy (7:00), who should hire Mike McCarthy in the wake of the Packers firing him (17:00), if the Panthers should move on from Ron Rivera (22:00), what to do with Cam Newton who looks injured (28:00), who wins the AFC North (33:30), who wins the AFC West (34:40), if the Eagles can make a run (38:15), if the Texans are a legitimate Super Bowl contender (40:15) and some college football playoff chatter.
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
